Used them about a year or so ago and had a great experience. Then in the summer of 2025 had more issues. Made the mistake of looking elsewhere and paid for it. October 2025 had an issue with my motor and obscure sand filter and within 36 … More

Meyer’s Pool Care remodeled my pool this year and did an awesome job!  Best part they did it less than a month.  They used high quality materials and their contractors did an outstanding job. … More Response from the owner a year ago Thank you Mike for trusting us with your remodel! We are thankful for customers like you.
